forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Partly cloudy skies. High 72F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies this evening will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 22C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 75F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 72F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 70F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
